event.name: STORAGE_CHECK_AUG_FR_FLESH_MAKER
event.text: Do you want to scan a new crew or make one yourself?

choice.text: Scan a crew to be added into the database

event.text: You gather up all the crew in your ship and bring them to the lab.

choice.text: Make a new crew in the Flesh Maker

event.text: You gather up all the ingredients for the process, considering which crew from your database you want to make.
You make a inventory check to see what you can spare for fuel making.

choice.text: Make a Random non-unique crew [10 fuel]

event.text: Your new crew steps out of the machine, you made sure to implant synthetic memories into them so they will serve you without question.

choice.text: Make a Random unique crew [25 fuel]

event.text: Your new crew steps out of the machine, you made sure to implant synthetic memories into them so they will serve you without question.

choice.text: Take your badge for filling the database!

event.text: Oh...wow you did it! I never thought anyone would ever get this far, but you did it! Congratulation! Have this badge in the form of an achievement to truly show your dedication to this ship!

event.name: FR_FLESH_MAKER_SCAN
event.text: At the lab you check the database for which crew you already have and which you don't. After a few minutes you come back with the full list, which new crew should be added to the database?

Your crew steps in front of a giant portal-like machine, it suddenly turns its lights on, engulfing your crew in the bright pink glare, after a few minutes the glare vanishes and the machine shuts off. Your crew is fine, if incredibly exhausted.
